DOC.brief_summary: This study assess therapeutic effect MDcure® device . MDcure® FDA Class 1 list medical device , produce ISO-13485 standard , delivers extremely low intensity ( nano Tesla ; 10-9 ) low frequency ( 1-100 Hertz ) electromagnetic field ( EMF ) intend reduce muscular ache pain particularly low back . assess reduction low back pain . Half participant receive MDcure device , half receive mock device .
DOC.brief_title: Estimation Therapeutic Effect MDcure Patients With Chronic Lower Back Pain
